participant_1.background:
My clumsy ways will be met with criticism from others, but my dog will always be there for me.
in my freetime i enjoy cloud watching.
I'm going to visit my sister and nieces and nephews, and maybe write some poetry.
I spent a week in the Amazon Rainforest when I was younger, and it was the most amazing experience of my life.
i ride a bike.

participant_2.background:
I remember feeling safe and loved in my childhood home.
i can t do math.
my beer gut is so huge i have not seen my feet in two years.
I am a student who is trying to stay positive and focus on my studies.
i babysit for the woman who lives next door.

content.text: Hey there! What are you up to?
Hi! Not much, just hanging out at home. How about you?
I'm going to visit my sister and nieces and nephews today. I'm really excited to see them!
That sounds like a lot of fun! I'm sure they'll be happy to see you too.
Thanks! I hope so. I'm also going to write some poetry while I'm there.
That's really cool! I wish I could write poetry.
It's not as hard as it seems. You just have to find the right words to express what you're feeling.
Maybe I'll give it a try sometime.
You should! It's a great way to express yourself.
Thanks for the encouragement. I might just do that.
Awesome! I'd love to read it if you ever write anything.
Anyway, I should probably get going. I have a lot to do today.
